summary: REQ-53 and REQ-54 appear implemented: HomePage now shows a 4th ModeCard linking to a new /real-apa-match route, App.tsx registers that route, and a new placeholder page component exists with English text and back-to-home navigation. However, the diff summary also indicates additional unrelated frontend changes (auth/loading logic, profile skill level selector, Accepting Gifts persistence and other behavior changes), which conflict with the constraint to keep the change limited to the 4th tile + placeholder page.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated authentication/loading behavior changes ("AuthGate" loading logic changes, deadlock prevention) beyond adding a 4th mode tile and placeholder page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains the change to adding the 4th mode tile + blank placeholder page and says not to modify existing behavior beyond that scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup dialog updated to include an APA 9-Ball skill level selector and persistence via backend profile.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also conflicts with constraint to keep the change limited and avoid modifying backend/API behavior for this placeholder step.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to PracticeStartPage behavior (skill level auto-loading, manual override tracking, duplicate name validation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says not to modify existing match modes behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Accepting Gifts mode behavior updated to load/persist baselines and automatically persist during gameplay, plus rules text changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says not to modify existing match modes or backend APIs; these are unrelated to the requested 4th tile + placeholder page.

hallucinated_features.description: Match history summary card updated with enhanced Accepting Gifts summary fields and generic end/save dialog text changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest says not to modify match history behavior.
